video.author: Timur Bekmambetov
video.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
video.description: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

video.author: Despicable Me
video.title: Banana
video.description: Minions go crazy over a banana.

video.author: Andrew Adamson
video.title: Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away
video.description: An original story featuring performances by Cirque du Soleil...

video.author: Ian Fitzgibbon
video.title: Death of a Superhero
video.description: A dying 15-year-old boy draws stories of an invincible superhero as he struggles with his mortality.

video.author: Pierre Coffin & Chris Renaud
video.title: Despicable Me 2
video.description: Second upcoming movie of another Despicable Me.

video.author: Tim Burton
video.title: Frankenweenie
video.description: Young Victor conducts a science experiment to bring his beloved dog Sparky back to life, only to face unintended, sometimes monstrous, consequences.

video.author: Tim Hooper
video.title: Les Miserables
video.description: An adaptation of the successful stage musical based on Victor Hugo's classic novel set in 19th-century France, in which a paroled prisoner named Jean Valjean seeks redemption.

video.author: Rian Johnson
video.title: Looper
video.description: In 2072, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent 30 years into the past, where a hired gun awaits. Someone like Joe, who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by transporting back Joe's future self.

video.author: J.J. Abrams
video.title: Star Trek 2
video.description: A fan made teaser trailer that fooled the Internet.

video.author: Marc Webb
video.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
video.description: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his father's former partner.

video.author: Christopher Nolan
video.title: The Dark Knight Rises
video.description: Eight years on, a new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelms Gotham's finest, and the Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

video.author: Peter Jackson
video.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
video.description: A curious Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, journeys to the Lonely Mountain with a vigorous group of Dwarves to reclaim a treasure stolen from them by the dragon Smaug.

video.author: Luke Cresswell & Steve McNicholas
video.title: The Last Reef
video.description: The Last Reef is an uplifting, inspirational large-format and 3D cinema experience capturing one of nature's more vibrant and diverse wonderlands. Exotic coral reefs, vibrant sea walls in the sub-arctic pulsating with anemones and crustaceans: these biodiversity hot spots are as vital to our lives as the rainforests.

video.author: Peter Hedges
video.title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
video.description: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

video.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

video.author: Jonathan Liebesman
video.title: Wrath of the Titans
video.description: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

video.author: Rich Moore
video.title: Wreck-It Ralph
video.description: The bad-guy character in a classic game who longs to be a hero brings trouble to his entire arcade after sneaking into a new first-person shooter game and unleashing a deadly enemy.
